ResearchProjectDef.label: Oni Clan Secret Medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ways to craft a series of serums. The secret medicine of the Oni squeezes the life potential of the user in an extreme way to awaken a specific extraordinary power. The side effects caused by it are almost unbearable for ordinary people. Only the Oni can swallow the price by relying on their special physique. Maybe this counts as a kind of racial patent protection? \n\nIn order to fully develop the power of this secret medicine, the Oni tribe formed a professional ninja group around each secret medicine. All their combat methods are based on the secret medicine.
